briefTitle: Effects of Continuous and Interval Physical Training Through the Intensity of the Incremental Shuttle Walk Test, on Functional Capacity and Quality of Life in Women With Malignant Breast Cancer During Chemotherapy Treatment
officialTitle: Effects of Continuous and Interval Physical Training Through the Intensity of the Incremental Shuttle Walk Test, on Functional Capacity and Quality of Life in Women With Malignant Breast Cancer During Chemotherapy Treatment
